name: reverse-engineer
description: Comprehensive fork analysis, refactoring decision support, and modular architecture guidance
longDescription: Reverse Engineer provides tools for maintaining divergent software forks. Features include: fork analysis with divergence debt metrics, seam identification for safe refactoring points, characterization testing with golden master patterns, and modular architecture guidance using leave-and-layer strategies. Essential for teams managing forked codebases.
